content: Describe the meaning of the proverb "Fortune Favors the Bold".

The proverb "Fortune Favors the Bold" suggests that people who take risks and act courageously are more likely to succeed or gain advantages. It emphasizes the idea that being proactive, daring, and willing to step out of one's comfort zone can lead to positive outcomes. This saying encourages individuals to take initiative and seize opportunities, implying that luck or good fortune tends to come to those who are not afraid to venture into the unknown or take decisive action.
